title: Global pork exports 2020 , by country
yAxis: Export volume in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
There is a difference of 3800.0 between the maximum Country EU and minimum Country China.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Export volume in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
Country EU has the highest Export volume in thousand metric tons and China has the lowest Export volume in thousand metric tons.
There is a difference of 3800.0 between the maximum Country EU and minimum Country China.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in thousand metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country EU and lowest at Country China.
Second maximum Export volume in thousand metric tons is found at Country United States.
The difference of Export volume in thousand metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 3800.0.
Country EU is higher than any other Countrys with value 3900.0, followed by United States, and Canada. Down to Country China with the lowest value 100.0.
The Country China has 2.64 times less Export volume in thousand metric tons than average.
The Export volume in thousand metric tons is 10347.0 if we add up values of all Countrys.
